user.description: Configure your Universal Water Heater device with temperature settings.

data_description.name: A friendly name for your water heater device
data_description.normal_temperature: Target temperature for Normal heating mode
data_description.eco_temperature: Target temperature for Eco heating mode (must be ≤ Normal temperature)
data_description.hysteresis: Temperature difference to prevent rapid on/off cycling

reconfigure.description: Update the device name for this integration.

data_description.name: A friendly name for your water heater device
data_description.normal_temperature: Target temperature for Normal heating mode
data_description.eco_temperature: Target temperature for Eco heating mode (must be ≤ Normal temperature)
data_description.hysteresis: Temperature difference to prevent rapid on/off cycling

configure_entities.title: Required Entity Sources
configure_entities.description: Configure the required entity sources for your water heater.

data_description.temperature_source_entity_id: Select the entity that provides the water temperature reading
data_description.switch_source_entity_id: Select the switch entity to control

configure_advanced.title: Advanced Settings
configure_advanced.description: Configure advanced options for debugging and customization.

data_description.enable_debugging: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting
data_description.custom_icon: Override the default icon for entities (optional, leave blank for default)
data_description.battery_aware: Pause heating when battery state of charge is low
data_description.use_solar_control: Enable solar control (on) for optimised mode, or use time-based control (off, default) for scheduled operation

configure_time_based.title: Time-Based Control
configure_time_based.description: Configure time-based control for optimised heating mode.

data_description.normal_mode_start: Time to start Normal mode heating
data_description.normal_mode_end: Time to end Normal mode heating
data_description.eco_mode_start: Time to start Eco mode heating
data_description.eco_mode_end: Time to end Eco mode heating

data_description.battery_threshold: Turn off heater when battery SoC drops below this percentage
data_description.battery_resume_threshold: Resume heating when battery SoC rises above this percentage (must be higher than stop threshold)
data_description.battery_soc_entity_id: Select the battery state of charge sensor entity

configure_solar.title: Solar Control
configure_solar.description: Configure solar-based control for optimised heating mode.

data_description.sun_entity_id: Select the sun entity to track solar position
data_description.sun_angle: Minimum angle above horizon (in degrees) for optimised mode activation

configure_optional.title: Optional Sensor Sources
configure_optional.description: Configure optional sensor sources for power monitoring. Leave blank to skip.

data_description.power_source_entity_id: Select the entity that provides power consumption data
data_description.voltage_source_entity_id: Select the entity that provides voltage data
data_description.current_source_entity_id: Select the entity that provides current (amperage) data

error.connection: Unable to connect to the server.
error.invalid_device_name: Invalid device name. Please provide a valid name.
error.time_ranges_overlap: Normal and Eco time ranges cannot overlap. Please adjust your start and end times.
